metadata.title: CVE-2018-1152 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libjpeg-turbo 1.5.90 is vulnerable to a denial of service vulnerabilitycaused by a divide by zero when processing a crafted BMP image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1152` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1').
